verses.name: Proverbs 19:12
verses.text: The king’s wrath is as the roaring of a lion; but his favour is as dew upon the grass.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:13
verses.text: A foolish son is the calamity of his father: and the contentions of a wife are a continual dropping.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:14
verses.text: House and riches are the inheritance of fathers: and a prudent wife is from the Lord.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:15
verses.text: Slothfulness casteth into a deep sleep; and an idle soul shall suffer hunger.

verses.name: Proverbs 19:16
verses.text: He that keepeth the commandment keepeth his own soul; but he that despiseth his ways shall die.
